title: Urmas Vadi
text:
Urmas Vadi (born 28 February 1977) is an <a href="Estonia">Estonia</a>n writer, scenarist, radio editor and personality, journalist and theatre director.
In 2002 he graduated from <a href="Tallinn%20University">Tallinn University</a> in radio directing () speciality. Since 2001 he is working as a culture and literary editor at Estonian Radio.
